title: Slave Boy
description: GAY BDSM EROTICA. 25-year-old alpha hottie Lucas Devero had everything going for him—killer body, great tech job, sick wheels, and all the college boys he wanted. Then Lucas wanted to learn what submitting to another man felt like. But young Lucas did not realize he was submitting to a man who shows no mercy. Leatherman Jake Heller quickly forces Lucas to choose between returning to his old life on the top or accepting his new place as Jake’s no-limits slave boy. WARNING: HARDCORE ACTION
author: S.F. Tanner
